description: This patch is significant update for the 3DS version of AT:ETDBIDK. This patch is mainly focused at increasing game stability and contains a large number of fixes. Please visit our website for additional details.
name:
Adventure Time™: ETDBIDK
Update 1
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
